biotools.summary: Brain Network Construction and Classification (BrainNetClass) toolbox to promote more advanced brain network construction methods to the filed, including some state‐of‐the‐art methods that were recently developed to capture complex and high‐order interactions among brain regions. The toolbox also integrates a well‐accepted and rigorous classification framework based on brain connectome features toward individualized disease diagnosis in a hope that the advanced network modeling could boost the subsequent classification.
